CustomField.description:
Switches the site to private beta. Registration requires a cookie placed after a successful entry of the invitation code with a matching email address.
Unchecking this box allows self-registration by the general public and removes links to the private beta home page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Switches the site to private beta. Registration requires a cookie placed after a successful entry of the invitation code with a matching email address.
CustomField.label: Private Beta
